an1.410-413:1: " … (40) develops the basis for psychic potency that possesses concentration due to desire and activities of striving … (4) develops the basis for psychic potency that possesses concentration due to energy and activities of striving … (42) develops the basis for psychic potency that possesses concentration due to mind and activities of striving … (43) develops the basis for psychic potency that possesses concentration due to investigation and activities of striving … "
